Description: Saudi Paper Manufacturing (known as: SPM) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2006. SPM operates within the Materials sector focusing on Paper Products. It has Companies operating across Northern Africa and Middle East. SPM is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1989.
